Class OclQueryUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.emf.facet.query.ocl.core.util.OclQueryUtil

  • public final class OclQueryUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    All necessary methods for the creation and evaluation of OCL expressions.
